Interface ProtocolModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpProtocolModule, Tn3270ProtocolModule
public interface ProtocolModule
Pluggable module describing how to detect and reconstruct a specific protocol.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<Integer>
    defaultServerPorts()
    Provides well-known server ports that hint at this protocol.
    ProtocolId
    id()
    Returns the protocol identifier served by this module.
    boolean
    matchesSignature(byte[] prefacePeek)
    Checks whether the given byte preface matches this protocol signature.
    MessageReconstructor
    newReconstructor(FiveTuple flow, ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics)
    Creates a new MessageReconstructor for the specified flow.

  • Method Details

    • id

      ProtocolId id()
      Returns the protocol identifier served by this module.
      Returns:
      protocol id
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • defaultServerPorts

      Set<Integer> defaultServerPorts()
      Provides well-known server ports that hint at this protocol.
      Returns:
      immutable set of default server ports
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • matchesSignature

      boolean matchesSignature(byte[] prefacePeek)
      Checks whether the given byte preface matches this protocol signature.
      Parameters:
      prefacePeek - sampled bytes from the beginning of a flow
      Returns:
      true when the signature matches
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • newReconstructor

      MessageReconstructor newReconstructor(FiveTuple flow, ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics)
      Creates a new MessageReconstructor for the specified flow.
      Parameters:
      flow - five-tuple associated with the session
      clock - clock port used for timestamping
      metrics - metrics sink for protocol-specific counters
      Returns:
      initialized reconstructor ready for MessageReconstructor.onStart()
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
